testcase.name: Parse a valid single word command
Parse a command with a direct object
Parse a command with an indirect object
testcase.system-out: Given the game parser.......................................................passed When the command "dig earth with spade" is parsed...........................passed Then the verb is "dig"......................................................passed And the direct object is "earth"............................................passed And the indirect object is "spade"..........................................passed And the parser response is "Success"........................................passed
